title: Medical Consults - Purist Natural Medicine
cleaned_text: Complimentary Consult If you have an questions related to services, pricing etc. you may schedule a complimentary 15 minute consult with Dr. Perrine to find out if the services at Purist Natural Medicine are a good fit for you. Note* No medical advice is given at the time of this consult. In-Person Visits Discuss your most pertinent health concerns with Dr. Perrine by scheduling a Naturopathic Visit today. Upon scheduling your first visit via the online scheduling platform or over the phone, you will receive a welcome email with a login to your patient portal. There you will find intake and consent forms to complete BEFORE your first visit. First visits include a thorough investigation into your health history and current health concerns This may or may not include: laboratory analysis, supplement and nutraceutical recommendations, physical medicine treatments, diet and lifestyle recommendations, and more. Together as a team, we will determine a treatment plan that best fits your needs. Purist Natural Medicine does NOT accept insurance. We don't answer to your insurance company, we answer to you. Telemedicine Option Receive naturopathic medical care from the comfort of your home. We offer telemedicine visits via our HIPAA-compliant platform for residents of California ONLY. This means you can live anywhere in California and still receive naturopathic care. Call and
